tool_description: Searches for available flights based on origin, destination, dates, and passenger criteria, returning flight options with basic details.

origin_airport.description: IATA airport code for departure location (3 characters)

destination_airport.description: IATA airport code for arrival location (3 characters)

return_date.description: Return date for round-trip flights in YYYY-MM-DD format

cabin_class.description: Preferred cabin class: economy, premium_economy, business, first

error_messages: Invalid airport code: Provide valid 3-character IATA airport codes for origin and destination.
Invalid date format: Use YYYY-MM-DD format for departure_date and return_date.
Date logic error: Departure date must be today or later, return date must be after departure date.
Invalid passenger count: Number must be between 1 and 9.
Invalid cabin class: Use one of [economy, premium_economy, business, first].
usage: Provide origin_airport, destination_airport, departure_date, and passenger_count. Optionally specify return_date for round-trip and cabin_class for preferred seating level.

airlines.description: Array of airline names for found flights

departure_times.description: Array of departure times in ISO format

arrival_times.description: Array of arrival times in ISO format
